snippet.title: HYPERVIOLENT - Coming to Early Access September 8!
snippet.description:
HYPERVIOLENT, the old-school sci-fi horror FPS oozing with atmosphere will grab hold of all shooter fans on September 8, 2022, when it launches in Early Access on PC via Steam, GOG, Epic Games Store and other digital stores. 
Wishlist it now, so you don't miss the release!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1409200/HYPERVIOLENT/
https://www.gog.com/en/game/hyperviolent

So go ahead and see how many skulls you can bash in with a severed arm or just unload with dual-wielded submachine guns - use and combine whatever weapons you find, just enjoy the carnage!

HYPERVIOLENT is a brutal, fast-paced old-school FPS in the style of classic sprite-based 3D games from the 1990s. Coming to Early Access in 2022.

An anomalous infection spreads through the mines of Commodus Asteroid 27-C. Brutally fight your way through hordes of monstrous foes as you attempt to contain the infection and uncover its dark origins in this gloriously violent, fast-paced retro shooter.

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/FulqrumPublishing
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FulqrumPublishing
Website: http://www.FulqrumPublishing.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FulqrumPublishing/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FulqrumPub
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FulqrumPublishing/

#Retro #FPS #horrorgaming
